# Allowed dependency licenses (one SPDX id per line). Pipeline fails on any other license.
# Override via env: LICENSE_ALLOWLIST in workflow (comma-separated).
# GPL, AGPL are disallowed by default. LGPL allowed for native deps (e.g. sharp).
MIT
Apache-2.0
BSD-2-Clause
BSD-3-Clause
0BSD
ISC
CC0-1.0
CC-BY-4.0
BlueOak-1.0.0
MPL-2.0
Python-2.0
LGPL-3.0
LGPL-3.0-or-later
UNLICENSED
